name: Sunspray Spirit
desc: A small pattern in the shape of an Asha that exudes the mesmerizing colors of summer. Increase your summer heat and enjoy everything this precious holiday has to offer!

customize.name: Sunspray Spirit
customize.desc: A small pattern in the shape of an Asha that exudes the mesmerizing colors of summer. Increase your summer heat and enjoy everything this precious holiday has to offer!

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Flame-Forged Insight
customize.desc: Tribal tales tell of a great blade forged by the People of the Springs to protect a child who would embark on a distant journey. This particular weapon appears to be a replica of that legendary sword.

customize.name: Drifter's Crystal Marrow
customize.desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Flame-Forged Insight."
At first glance, it's just like any old mineral you might find throughout Natlan, but due to differences in local geology, even the same type of rock can have slight differences in Stonemarrow that can only be uncovered upon closer inspection. That's why the travelers who once wandered through Natlan collected this mineral — some things need to be held in the palm of the hand before you can appreciate their uniqueness.

customize.name: Philosophies of Contention
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Contention is the principle by which all is weighed in the Nation of Pyro.

Its purpose is to make yourself stronger. After the outcome of a competition has been decided, the victor gains the confidence to be sure of their direction, while the loser gains insights on how they must become stronger. Beyond winning or losing, this is the true meaning of contention.

customize.name: Philosophies of Kindling
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Offering up kindling is the established rule of the Nation of Pyro.
What is meant by offering kindling is to offer up a sacrifice before one obtains something, though it does not always guarantee a response or return. Its true meaning lies in paying a price without expecting a reward — for in the end, the day when the fruits will be reaped is sure to come.

That's why the travelers who once wandered through Natlan collected this mineral — some things need to be held in the palm of the hand before you can appreciate their uniqueness.

customize.name: Philosophies of Conflict
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Conflict is considered reason in the Nation of Pyro.
The premise of conflict is that all parties involved must confront their own desires with the utmost sincerity. Only then, amid the fight or debate, can they remain mindful of what they wish to achieve and stay true to their original objectives.

customize.name: Sanctifying Essence
customize.desc:
Artifact EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Artifacts are themselves the physical manifestation of ideals and memories. Materials such as this, which contain the distilled essence of the power thereof, can make these memories and ideals clearer and stronger still.

customize.name: Adventures in Blazing Hue
customize.desc: Bennett's traveling attire for his journeys in Natlan. Dyed lucky lakewater blue with hints of blazing orange, these clothes emanate an overflowing vitality that matches the land in which they are worn.

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.
